channel.title: Change Server IP
channel.description:
Hey guys.
How to change the server IP. I have an source and client, but if i try to get in, it says "Error connecting to server". I'll want change server IP, to make an server that its Mine. How to do this?
:confused:

item.title: Change Server IP
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

-.- whatsmyip.org

You dont change your server ip

You can change the client ip
gui.java

	private Gui(String args[]) 
	{
		super();
			try {

			System.out.println("Loading client..");
			Serverip = "127.0.0.1";
			sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));
 			initUI();
		} 
		catch(Exception ex)
		{
			ex.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

Read full topic
